Container.Name: ClawdBot
Container.Overview: ClawdBot is your personal AI assistant powered by Anthropic's Claude. It connects Claude to your favorite messaging platforms including WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Signal, iMessage, and WebChat. Features include voice capabilities, browser automation, canvas rendering, and tool execution through plugins. Self-hosted for complete privacy and control.

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: Your Anthropic API key (required). Get one at https://console.anthropic.com/ by navigating to Settings ‚Üí API Keys.

Config.Name: Gateway Port
Config.Description: Gateway WebUI and API port. Access the ClawdBot web interface at http://[IP]:[PORT:18789]

Config.Name: Bridge Port
Config.Description: Bridge communication port for internal ClawdBot services

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: Directory for ClawdBot configuration, sessions, and provider data. This is where all persistent data is stored.

Config.Name: Workspace Directory
Config.Description: Working directory for Claude Code execution and file operations

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions. Use 99 for nobody user on Unraid, or your user's ID.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions. Use 100 for users group on Unraid, or your group's ID.

Config.Name: Gateway Port (ENV)
Config.Description: Gateway port environment variable (must match port mapping)

Config.Name: Bridge Port (ENV)
Config.Description: Bridge port environment variable (must match port mapping)

Config.Name: Enable WhatsApp
Config.Description: Enable WhatsApp provider. Requires WhatsApp Business API or compatible service. Configure in WebUI after enabling.

Config.Name: Enable Telegram
Config.Description: Enable Telegram provider. Requires Telegram bot token from @BotFather. Configure in WebUI after enabling.

Config.Name: Enable Discord
Config.Description: Enable Discord provider. Requires Discord bot token from Discord Developer Portal. Configure in WebUI after enabling.

Config.Name: Enable Signal
Config.Description: Enable Signal provider. Requires signal-cli setup (advanced). Configure in WebUI after enabling.

Config.Name: Enable iMessage
Config.Description: Enable iMessage provider. Requires macOS host with imsg (advanced, macOS only). Configure in WebUI after enabling.

Config.Name: Enable WebChat
Config.Description: Enable WebChat interface. This is the built-in web interface accessible via WebUI. Recommended to keep enabled.

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Logging verbosity level. Options: debug, info, warn, error. Use 'debug' for troubleshooting.

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Timezone for container (e.g., America/New_York, Europe/London, etc.)

Config.Name: Node Environment
Config.Description: Node.js environment mode. Keep as 'production' unless debugging.

Container.Changes: ### v1.0.0 (2026-01-13) - Initial release for Unraid Community Applications - Support for all messaging providers: WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Signal, iMessage, WebChat - Automated onboarding with Anthropic API key authentication - WebUI for configuration and management at http://[IP]:18789 - Multi-platform support (amd64, arm64) - Non-root user execution for enhanced security - Health monitoring and automatic recovery - Persistent configuration and session storage - Comprehensive documentation and troubleshooting guides
Container.Description:
ClawdBot is your personal AI assistant powered by Anthropic's Claude, packaged for easy deployment on Unraid.
**Key Features:** - ü§ñ Powered by Claude AI (Anthropic API) - üí¨ Multi-platform: WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Signal, iMessage, WebChat - üåê Built-in WebUI for easy configuration - üîß Automated setup with non-interactive onboarding - üîí Secure: Non-root execution, encrypted credentials - üì¶ Multi-architecture: Supports amd64 and arm64
**Quick Start:** 1. Get your Anthropic API key from https://console.anthropic.com/ 2. Install this container and enter your API key 3. Access WebUI at http://[IP]:18789 4. Configure your preferred messaging providers 5. Start chatting with Claude!
**First-Time Setup:** The container will automatically run onboarding on first start. This process: - Initializes ClawdBot with your API key - Sets up the gateway daemon - Creates necessary configuration files - Takes about 30-60 seconds
**Provider Configuration:** All providers (except WebChat) require additional setup: - **Telegram**: Create bot via @BotFather, paste token in WebUI - **Discord**: Create bot in Discord Developer Portal, paste token in WebUI - **WhatsApp/Signal/iMessage**: See documentation for advanced setup
**Support:** - Documentation: https://github.com/eYdr1en/clawdbot-unraid - Issues: https://github.com/eYdr1en/clawdbot-unraid/issues - Official ClawdBot: https://github.com/clawdbot/clawdbot
**Note:** This is an unofficial community packaging of ClawdBot for Unraid.
